fields.summary: iOS: Touch events not fired outside sub view in table view row

comments.body: So apparently the bubbleParent property was intended to solve this: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/master/apidoc/Titanium/Proxy.yml However, bubbleParent is true by default, which means that touch events SHOULD BE fired outside sub view in table view row by DEFAULT, which they are not. Furthermore, if bubbleParent is set to false on the sub view, the sub view should continue to receive touch events, but it does not.

Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130108153753
Titanium SDK:3.0.1.v20130109180643
Titanium Â Studio:3.0.1.201212181159
Device: Simulator iOS 6.0
